title: Ginger spice Geri Halliwell morphs into one of the Peaky Blinders for Halloween

Geri Halliwell is in full Halloween mode as she shared a snap of herself in costume dressed as a character from the Peaky Blinders .

Former Spice Girl Geri, 47, transformed herself into Tommy Shelby, played by Cillian Murphy , one of the main characters from the hit show.

The popstar was a dead ringer for the famous actor, and she even sat on a horse to complete the look.

"Ready for Halloween ? By order of the Peaky Blinders," she wrote.

Geri was clad in a long tailored black coat paired with chunky black boots, and a crisp white shirt, finished off with a matching black waistcoat.

Of course, the star had an iconic flat cap on to add true Peaky Blinder style, while her hair was tucked completely away inside the cap.

Her transformation comes after her pal Mel B made a shocking sex confession during an interview with Piers Morgan.

(Image: therealgerihalliwell /Instagram)

On his Life Stories show, Melanie Brown claimed the pair had slept together at the height of their Spice Girl fame.

And now Mel B believes Geri still "hates" her after the bombshell.

When asked if they had slept together, Mel nodded and said: "She's going to hate me for this. She's all posh in her country house with her husband."

(Image: therealgerihalliwell /Instagram)

Scary Spice admitted to the Loose Women panel that "it was a little bit strange" on tour with Ginger Spice.

When asked how it was in the dressing room, she said: "Oh god. It was a little bit strange. For me the whole thing was kind of, not strange thats the wrong word, out of place."

(Image: therealgerihalliwell /Instagram)

After looking back at the Life Stories clip, where Mel C's jaw dropped after hearing her pals confession, Mel insisted she hadn't said anything wrong.

"I didn't really say much," claimed Mel, who has admitted tensions were high with Geri after the bombshell.

(Image: Daily Mirror)

(Image: Daily Mirror)

Loose Women panellist Jane Moore asked Mel whether Geri "hated" her.

"I think probably," confessed Mel. "And she probably still does. What can you do? We all love each other at the end of the day.

"It all gets blown out of proportion and I’ve got a loud mouth so what can you do."
description: Geri Halliwell, 47, morphed into a Peaky Blinders character as she gets ready for Halloween
